instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2337 knocked component off
threads.message:
Hello. After replacing a SATA connector that was broken by a coworker on a 2009 Mac Pro Backplane Board, I had noticed I knocked off a small component. If the name is similar to that of the MacBook line, I believe it to be a capacitor (It's either C8180 or CB180; not sure, the text is a bit hard to read). It's apart of the SYS_RESET circuit (also writing on the board)

This would be a trivial replacement, however, I can't find the component anywhere I've looked, and I have no schematic for this board in particular... Searching for a schematic to buy can't be done because I'm not the store owner. I was wondering if by chance any of you guys and/or girls would happen to have the schematic and know the , or a means to figure out the capacitance of the would-be capacitor that is missing (Still a noobie, basically an apprentice at this job)?

​Thanks in advance for the replies.

Will attach a photo.

threads.title: 820-2337 knocked component off
threads.message: Looks to me like a cap in the SATA data line. Board should work fine without it, just the SATA port will be dead. You can take a cap from a macbook board from the SATA line, 0.01uF.

threads.title: 820-2337 knocked component off
threads.message:
pls can anyone provide technical information for 820-2337-a board. 
In all i have 4 boards. In 2 boards all lights, power supply , fans , graphic card fan gets on fine but on display.
In two boards nothing get on. when i press the diag led switch one orange led blinks for once. 
Pls share the technical information. Also i find totally 4 bios. 1- U8700 , 2- UB301, 3-UC650, 4- UB201. Any idea what each does. Pls reply. Thanks

threads.title: 820-2337 knocked component off
threads.message: Please, open separate thread with each board.
